content: stitch and knit 2 stitches toward the center of the crotch ◇put a marker attach if necessary round2 k30 pull the yarn-tail to prevent the stitch from loosening round3 k30 round4 k30 round5 k30 round6 k30 round7 k30 round8 k30 round9 k28 k2tog round10 ssk k27 round11 k28 round12 k26 k2tog round13 ssk k25 round14 k26 round15 k24 k2tog round16 ssk k23 round17 k24 round18 k22 k2tog round19 ssk k21 round20 k22 round21 k22 round22 k22 round23 k22 round24 k22 round25 k22 round26 k22 round27 k22 5 / 6 ©2021 nioknits keito s jeans doll clothes may 13 2021 round28 k22 round29 k22 round30 k22 round31 k22 round32 k22 round33 k22 round34 k22 round35 k22 round36 k22 round37 k22 round38 k22 round39 k22 round40 k22 round41 k22 round42 k22 round43 k22 round44 k22 round45 k22 finish bind off knitwise with 4 0mm needle cut the yarn leaving 10cm yarn tail and weave it into the stitch to finish 6 / 6 ©2021 nioknits
